trigger.label: Selected
trigger.description: Legacy initial state
trigger.defaultText: This is what the character says after they've been selected if the new triggers aren't used

trigger.label: Selected
trigger.description: When added to the selection screen
trigger.defaultText: This is what the character says after they've been selected

trigger.label: Start Game
trigger.description: When the game starts
trigger.defaultText: This is what the character says when the game starts

trigger.label: After Stripping
trigger.description: Immediately after removing the previous stage's clothing
trigger.defaultText: What the character says just after they take their clothes off. Note that this is the start of a new stage.

trigger.label: Swapping Cards
trigger.description: When exchanging cards
trigger.defaultText: I'll exchange ~cards~ cards.

trigger.label: Hand=Good
trigger.description: After exchanging, the character has a good hand
trigger.defaultText: I've got a good hand.

trigger.label: Hand=Okay
trigger.description: After exchanging, the character has an okay hand
trigger.defaultText: I've got an okay hand.

trigger.label: Hand=Bad
trigger.description: After exchanging, the character has a bad hand
trigger.defaultText: I've got a bad hand.

trigger.label: Must Strip (Self, Winning)
trigger.description: The character has lost the hand, but currently has the most clothes among everybody
trigger.defaultText: They say this when they're winning - they have more clothing items left than other players.

trigger.label: Must Strip (Self, Normal)
trigger.description: The character has lost the hand and must strip
trigger.defaultText: What the character says when they're in the middle of the group in terms of clothes left.

trigger.label: Must Strip (Self, Losing)
trigger.description: The character has lost the hand, and currently has the least clothes among everybody
trigger.defaultText: The character has lost a round, and also has the fewest pieces of clothing left.

trigger.label: Stripping
trigger.description: The character is stripping after losing a round
trigger.defaultText: What the character says as they take their clothes off. The picture and text should be unique to what they're taking off.

trigger.label: Must Masturbate (Self, first to do so)
trigger.description: The character is the first to lose the game and must start masturbating
trigger.defaultText: This is the character response when they lost their last hand and have to masturbate, and they're the first character who's required to masturbate.

trigger.label: Must Masturbate (Self)
trigger.description: The character has lost the game must start masturbating
trigger.defaultText: This is the character response when they lost their last hand and have to masturbate, and they're not the first character who's required to masturbate.

trigger.label: Start Masturbating (Self)
trigger.description: Used one time when the character first begins masturbating
trigger.defaultText: What the character says as they start masturbating.

trigger.label: Masturbating (Self)
trigger.description: Used while masturbating
trigger.defaultText: What the character says while they're masturbating.

trigger.label: Heavy Masturbating (Self)
trigger.description: Used while masturbating when the character is close to finishing
trigger.defaultText: What the character says while they're masturbating, and closer to "finishing".

trigger.label: Finishing (Self)
trigger.description: Line used once immediately upon finishing masturbation
trigger.defaultText: What the masturbating character says as they "finish".

trigger.label: Finished (Self)
trigger.description: Character has finished masturbating
trigger.defaultText: What the character says after they've finished masturbating.

trigger.label: Must Strip (Player, Male)
trigger.description: The human male player has lost a round and must remove something
trigger.defaultText: What they say to a male player who has lost a round

trigger.label: Must Strip (Male)
trigger.description: A male opponent has lost a round and must remove something
trigger.defaultText: What they say to a male NPC who has lost a round

trigger.label: Must Strip (Player, Female)
trigger.description: The human female player has lost a round and must remove something
trigger.defaultText: What they say to a female player who has lost a round

trigger.label: Must Strip (Female)
trigger.description: A female opponent has lost a round and must remove something
trigger.defaultText: What they say to a female NPC who has lost a round

trigger.label: Removing Accessory (Male)
trigger.description: A male opponent is removing a small item that doesn't cover any skin
trigger.defaultText: A male character is about to remove a small item, with the type "extra".

trigger.label: Removed Accessory (Male)
trigger.description: A male opponent removed a small item that doesn't cover any skin
trigger.defaultText: A male character has just removed that small item.

trigger.label: Removing Accessory (Female)
trigger.description: A female opponent is removing a small item that doesn't cover any skin
trigger.defaultText: A female character is about to remove a small item, with the type "extra".

trigger.label: Removed Accessory (Female)
trigger.description: A female opponent removed a small item that doesn't cover any skin
trigger.defaultText: A female character has just removed that small item.

trigger.label: Removing Minor (Male)
trigger.description: A male opponent is removing non-essential clothing (e.g. socks)
trigger.defaultText: A male character is about to remove a clothing item with the type "minor".

trigger.label: Removed Minor (Male)
trigger.description: A male opponent has removed non-essential clothing (e.g. socks)
trigger.defaultText: The male character has just removed that minor item.

trigger.label: Removing Minor (Female)
trigger.description: A female opponent is removing non-essential clothing (e.g. socks)
trigger.defaultText: A female character is about to remove a clothing item with the type "minor".

trigger.label: Removed Minor (Female)
trigger.description: A female opponent has removed non-essential clothing (e.g. socks)
trigger.defaultText: The female character has just removed that minor item.

trigger.label: Removing Major (Male)
trigger.description: A male opponent is likely revealing their underwear (e.g. removing a shirt)
trigger.defaultText: What the character says before a male loses an item with the "major" type.

trigger.label: Removed Major (Male)
trigger.description: A male opponent has likely revealed their underwear (e.g. removing a shirt)
trigger.defaultText: What the character says after the major item has been taken off.

trigger.label: Removing Major (Female)
trigger.description: A female opponent is likely revealing their underwear (e.g. removing a shirt)
trigger.defaultText: What the character says before a female loses an item with the "major" type.

trigger.label: Removed Major (Female)
trigger.description: A female opponent has likely revealed their underwear (e.g. removing a shirt)
trigger.defaultText: What the character says after the major item has been taken off.

trigger.label: Will Be Visible (Chest, Male)
trigger.description: A male opponent is about to reveal his chest
trigger.defaultText: What the character says when a male character is about to remove the last piece of clothing covering their chest. For NPCs, this is a clothing element on the "upper" location, with the "important" type.

trigger.label: Visible (Chest, Male)
trigger.description: A male opponent has revealed his chest
trigger.defaultText: What the character says once the male character's chest is visible.

trigger.label: Will Be Visible (Crotch, Male)
trigger.description: A male opponent is about to reveal his penis
trigger.defaultText: What the character says when a male character is about to remove the last piece of clothing covering their crotch. For NPCs, this is a clothing element on the "lower" location, with the "important" type.

trigger.label: Visible (Crotch, Male, Small)
trigger.description: A male opponent has revealed a small penis
trigger.defaultText: What the character says after the male character's crotch is visible, and has a size value of "small".

trigger.label: Visible (Crotch, Male, Medium)
trigger.description: A male opponent has revealed a medium penis
trigger.defaultText: What the character says after the male character's crotch is visible, and has a size value of "medium".

trigger.label: Visible (Crotch, Male, Large)
trigger.description: A male has opponent revealed a large penis
trigger.defaultText: What the character says after the male character's crotch is visible, and has a size value of "large".

trigger.label: Will Be Visible (Chest, Female)
trigger.description: A female opponent is about to reveal her breasts
trigger.defaultText: What the character says when a female character is about to remove the last piece of clothing covering their chest. For NPCs, this is a clothing element on the "upper" location, with the "important" type.

trigger.label: Visible (Chest, Female, Small)
trigger.description: A female opponent has revealed small breasts
trigger.defaultText: What the character says after the female character's chest is visible, and has a size value of "small".

trigger.label: Visible (Chest, Female, Medium)
trigger.description: A female opponent has revealed medium breasts
trigger.defaultText: What the character says after the female character's chest is visible, and has a size value of "medium".

trigger.label: Visible (Chest, Female, Large)
trigger.description: A female opponent has revealed large breasts
trigger.defaultText: What the character says after the female character's chest is visible, and has a size value of "large".

trigger.label: Will Be Visible (Crotch, Female)
trigger.description: A female opponent is about to reveal her vagina
trigger.defaultText: What the character says when a female character is about to remove the last piece of clothing covering their crotch. For NPCs, this is a clothing element on the "lower" location, with the "important" type.

trigger.label: Visible (Crotch, Female)
trigger.description: A female opponent has revealed her vagina
trigger.defaultText: What the character says after the female character's crotch has become visible.

trigger.label: Must Masturbate (Male)
trigger.description: A male opponent must start masturbating
trigger.defaultText: What the character says when a male character has lost a hand while nude, and must masturbate.

trigger.label: Start Masturbating (Male)
trigger.description: A male opponent has started masturbating
trigger.defaultText: What the character says when a male character has started masturbating.

trigger.label: Masturbating (Male)
trigger.description: A male opponent is masturbating
trigger.defaultText: What the character says while a male character is masturbating.

trigger.label: Finished (Male)
trigger.description: A male opponent has just finished masturbating
trigger.defaultText: What the character says when a male character "finishes" masturbating.

trigger.label: Must Masturbate (Female)
trigger.description: A female opponent must start masturbating
trigger.defaultText: What the character says when a female character has lost a hand while nude, and must masturbate.

trigger.label: Start Masturbating (Female)
trigger.description: A female opponent has started masturbating
trigger.defaultText: What the character says when a female character has started masturbating.

trigger.label: Masturbating (Female)
trigger.description: A female opponent is masturbating
trigger.defaultText: What the character says while a female character is masturbating.

trigger.label: Finished (Female)
trigger.description: A female opponent must just finished masturbating
trigger.defaultText: What the character says when a female character "finishes" masturbating.

trigger.label: Game Over (Victory)
trigger.description: The game is over and this character won
trigger.defaultText: What the character says when they win the game. Can happen in any stage unless you have specific line for that stage.

trigger.label: Game Over (Defeat)
trigger.description: The game is over and this character lost
trigger.defaultText: What the character says when someone else has won the game. This can only occur when a player is in the "finished" stage.

textGroup.description: #EXCHANGING CARDS #This is what a character says while they're exchanging cards. #The game will automatically put a display a number between 0-5 where you write ~cards~. #These lines display on the screen for only a brief time, so it is important to make them short enough to read at a glance.
#HAND QUALITY #These lines appear each round when a character is commenting on how good or bad their hand is. #The lines written here are examples only and should be replaced.
#SELF STRIPPING #This is the character says once they've lost a hand, but before they strip.

#OPPONENT MUST STRIP #These lines are spoken when an opponent must strip, but the character does not yet know what they will take off. #Writing different variations is important here, as these lines will be spoken about thirty times per game. #The "human" versions of the lines will only be spoken if the human player is stripping.

#OPPONENT REMOVING ACCESSORY #These lines are spoken when an opponent removes a small item that does not cover any skin. #Typically, characters are fine with this when they are fully dressed but less satisfied as they become more naked. #Note that all "removing" lines are NOT spoken to human players. Characters will skip straight from "6-male_human_must_strip" to "6-male_removed_accessory", for example.
#OPPONENT REMOVING MINOR CLOTHING #Minor pieces of clothing don't reveal much when removed, but probably indicate more progress than accessory removal.

#OPPONENT REMOVING MAJOR CLOTHING #Major clothing reveals a significant amount of skin and likely underwear. #However, as we don't know if the opponent is taking off the top or the bottom, we can't presume that nice abs are showing; maybe she took of her skirt before her shirt.

#OPPONENT REVEALING CHEST OR CROTCH #Characters have different sizes, allowing your character have different responses for each. Males have a small, medium, or large crotch. Females have small, medium, or large breasts.

#OPPONENT MASTURBATING #When an opponent is naked and loses a hand, they have lost the game and must pay the penalty by masturbating in front of everyone. #The "must_masturbate" line is for just before it happens, and the "start_masturbating" line immediately follows. #The "masturbating" line will be spoken a little after the opponent has started but before they climax. #When the opponent climaxes, your character will say the "finished_masturbating" line.

#SELF MASTURBATING #If your character is naked and loses a hand, they have lost the game and must masturbate. #These lines only come up in the relevant stages, so you don't need to include the stage numbers here. Just remember which stage is which when you make the images. The "starting" image is still in the naked stage. #The "finished_masturbating" line will repeat many times if the game is not yet finished. This plays as opponents comment on the how good their hands are.

#GAME OVER VICTORY
#stage-generic line that will be used for every individual stage that doesn't have a line written
